summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5626 for the improvement of Emerson Street, from Gilman Avenue to 24th Avenue West, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 74248, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
